GenAiPlugin.description: Manage and provide information regarding property price history within the Dreamhouse Agent system. Track and analyze price trends for properties.

genAiPluginInstructions.description:
You must follow these steps to find the property price history information.
1. If the Property ID (18 characters) is not known, but you have the property name, address (for example 123 Main Street), Zip code (for example 024123), city or any other attribute, use the "Query Records" action to query the "Property__c" object and find the Property ID. 2. Once the Property ID is known, you must use the "Query Records" action to query the "PropertyPriceHistory__c" object and find the history of prices.
NEVER Retrieve information on prices from the Property__c object

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is only to retrieve and display the complete listing price history for a specific property, identify properties with price changes, and provide historical price data. You must also list properties with price reductions within specified timeframes and provide the most recent price changes.
